position.marginalia_text: { Splendida omnia: nihil vanum. Vbique cordatus: nusq[uam] superbus.

marginalia.translation: All things are splendid, nothing in vain. Everywhere sensible, never proud.

position.marginalia_text: Nihil vulgare in homine / raro: singula dicta, et facta / plus quàm ordinaria.

marginalia.translation: Nothing is common in a rare man; his sayings are singular, and his deeds greater than ordinary matters.

position.marginalia_text: Vulgaris est, qui non / excedit / ordinarium / loquendi, et agendi modum.

marginalia.translation: Common is the man who cannot move beyond an ordinary manner of speaking and acting.
The older the mind, the more lively it is.

position.marginalia_text: Omnia interna viuida, atq[ue] florida: externa etiam omnia, nisi aliquandò cryptic[ω]s, et politica de Causa. Reuirescite pulchra, dulciaq[ue] omnia: et docete Mundum, vti humanis bonis diuina Foelicitate. Munera, la[e]titiamq[ue]

marginalia.translation: All internal things are lively and florid; all external things as well, unless at any point cryptic, and with regard to some political occasion. Renew beautiful things, and all sweet things, and teach the world to enjoy divine happiness in human affairs. [Renew] the gifts and joy of God.

position.marginalia_text: Accessorium seguitur principale: tanta Fortuna tantam Virtutem: ipsumq[ue] hominis summu[m] bonu[m], summa[m]

marginalia.translation: Something accessory follows the principle matter. Such great fortune in such great virtue, and the highest good itself of man is his greatest industriousness.

position.marginalia_text: Instrumenta instrumentorum, Animus, et Corpus: qua[e] in primis facienda, quantum vlla vi potes, actu pra[e]ualida, effectuq[ue] pra[e]potentia. Ne quid Tui ipsius deficiat

marginalia.translation: Mind and body are the greatest instruments, which are to be used in the first instance with as much strength as you can. They are most strong in deed, and most powerful in effect. Nothing shall be lacking for you in the active operations of life.
